-| wceq(cdm(cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(cdm(cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chomf, c0), cfv(chomf, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
⊣ dom(((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)))=(Base ` c0)
⊣ dom(((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1)))=(Base ` c1)
⊣ (w0 →(Homf ` c0)=(Homf ` c1))

body.origin: |- wceq(cdm(cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cbs, c0))

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))

⊣ (w0 →(Homf ` c0)=(Homf ` c1))

comment: Deduce equality of base sets from equality of Hom-sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
